(B) Maintained in good repair.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not constructed, designed, installed according to law
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Remove and replace to be in compliance with law.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Sec. 2129. (1) All of the following food establishments shall employ a minimum of 1 managerial employee who is currently certified under a personnel certification program accredited by the American national standards institute, utilizing the conference for food protection standards:  (a) A food service establishment that is not any of the following:    (i) Operating under a temporary food service establishment license.  (ii) A vending machine location.     (b) An extended retail food establishment.  (c) Operated within a retail grocery.  (2) An individual certified under subsection (1) shall be recognized with full faith and credit by the state and all local units of government throughout the state.  (3) The department may promulgate rules to do all of the following:  (a) Develop requirements for retail food establishments to follow when employing certified food safety managers or personnel.  (b) Set a reasonable date for compliance with the requirements under subdivision (a) taking into consideration existing local personnel certification requirements.  (c) Establish certification fees necessary to implement, maintain, and track certified individuals directly or by contract. The department may annually adjust the schedule of fees to provide that the fee charged is sufficient to cover the cost of the certification tracking program.  (d) Implement and enforce the requirements described in subdivision (a).    (4) The certification program developed by the American national standards institute, as it exists on April 1, 2008 , is incorporated by reference. The department may adopt updates to the certification program accreditation standards in subsection (1) by rule.     (5) This section does not prohibit any local legislative body from implementing a food handler program, an employee health certification program, or a manager certification program, if it is not in conflict with this section.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) A handwashing sink shall be equipped to provide water at a temperature of at least 38°C (100°F) through a mixing valve or combination faucet. (Pf)  
(B) A steam mixing valve may not be used at a handwashing sink.  
(C) A self-closing, slow-closing, or metering faucet shall provide a flow of water for at least 15 seconds without the need to reactivate the faucet.   
(D) An automatic handwashing facility shall be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD shall be safe, unADULTERATED and honestly presented. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
A FOOD specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A) or (B) shall be discarded if it:  
    (1) Exceeds the temperature and time combination specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A),              except time that the product is frozen; (P)
    (2) Is in a container or PACKAGE that does not bear a date or day; (P) or
    (3) Is appropriately marked with a date or day that exceeds a temperature and              time combination as specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A). (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.itemDescription: Ready to eat, potentially hazardous food(s)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: An air gap between the water supply inlet and the flood level rim of the PLUMBING FIXTURE, EQUIPMENT, or nonFOOD EQUIPMENT shall be at least twice the diameter of the water supply inlet and may not be less than 1 inch. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.subItem: between supply line and flood rim of plumbing fixture
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Less than twice the diameter of supply line
violationsByInspectionidList.subLocation: At the Over head spray unit
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide air gap that is twice the diameter of the drain line and no less than 1 inch.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
A WAREWASHING machine shall be equipped with a TEMPERATURE MEASURING DEVICE that indicates the temperature of the water:
(A)  In each wash and rinse tank; (Pf) and
(B)  As the water enters the hot water SANITIZING final rinse manifold or in the chemical SANITIZING solution tank. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES may not be reused.
(B) The bulk milk container dispensing tube shall be cut on the diagonal leaving no more than one inch protruding from the chilled dispensing head.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Water under pressure shall be provided to all fixtures, EQUIPMENT, and nonFOOD EQUIPMENT that are required to use water unless otherwise approved. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide sufficient water pressure to meet demand of use.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Golightly  Career Tech
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except as otherwise approved, light bulbs shall be shielded, coated, or otherwise shatter-resistant in areas where there is exposed FOOD; clean EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, and LINENS; or unwrapped SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide adequate light shields and end caps or shatter-proof bulbs.
